inn1.comm: some away shape first up but starting too far outside off
making him play now with a closer line to off, it moves away a tad, he jabs it down to third man
beaten first ball as he pushes at an outswinger
this time he watches it move away and lets it be
that'll go, wide and overpitched, sent screaming past point off the front foot
flashes at a full one, and the away movement takes a thick edge to third man
attacks an overpitched delivery, cannot quite time it as he hits it to mid off
sees a bit of with and cracks it to deep backward point
produces the outside edge with a 135 kph length ball that kicks on the batsman, but falls short of second slip
comes in with the angle and is nudged square on the leg side
defends a good length delivery to the off side
nips in from a fuller length and is flicked nicely through square leg, Lakmal seems to have it covered as he runs across to deep square, but messes it up in the end with a clumsy dive
slight away shape from a good length close to off, left alone
jabs a good length delivery out to third man
beats the outside edge with a tight line around off stump, batsman is stuck on the crease as he prods at it
bounces from back of a length, but this time he watches it go past
another leave now as he lets this outswinger go past outside off
straightens from a good length and he runs it down to third man
seaming in from a good length, hits him on the pad, but was going down leg
short of a good length ball pushed back down the track
this was in the air as he squirted a length ball, just out of the reach of backward point though
staying in the crease and pushing a length ball softly to the off side
nipping in from just back of a length, tight line around off, defended from the crease
pushed on the off side for a quick single
good delivery, is angled in good length and then holds its line, forcing him to adjust late and stab it to leg
reaches out a touch outside off to push it away to point
not getting the room or the length to have a go, just short of driving length, right on off stump, defended
turned to vacant midwicket for a single
beauty, this came in to off on a good length, and then jagged away, bounced extra too, leaving the batsman clueless
reaches to a wide one and has a swing but misses
drops a good length ball close to the pitch on the off side and rushes across for a single
lovely, he's leaned into this drive, placed it through extra cover, and held the pose as he watches it disappear across the turf
gets it come in, Anamul pushes it towards mid on, and also sends back the non-striker wisely
shoulders arms to a good length delivery outside off
runs a length delivery to backward point
works a good length delivery from off in front of mid on and it is an easy single in the end
gets on top of this back of a length delivery and squeezes it past cover
he's bowled a couple of these, pitches it up, angles it in, makes him push at it and beats him with some away movement
hint of away movement again, but this time he is not playing at it
leans forward outside off and guides this one to backward point
overpitched and sent packing past point with a forward stride and a clean connection
carefully guides this good length ball to point
pushes a length ball with slight turn down the track
leading edge on this fuller one to the off side
angled across the right-hander, who taps it towards cover
some extra bounce now on this length offbreak as he goes back and blocks
fuller one and he drives to extra cover off the front foot
takes a stride out to this full ball and drives to mid off
stays half forward and guides a straightening pitched up ball to point
comes in with the angle and strikes him on the thigh pad as he fails to work it to leg
short of a good length ball nudged to fine leg
well bowled, pitched up and coming in to middle, he gets the stride forward in time to keep it out
that hurried onto him from just back of a length, again, he gets bat down on it in time to knock it back
gets something away this time, turns this off the pad down to fine leg
comes forward and works a fuller one to the bowler
drives a tossed up ball to extra cover
this time he hits the gap, reaches the pitch and drives past cover, two men after it but it has been hit too well
some more width on this flatter one and he goes back to punch it through the same area, excellent timing again
some turn into him from outside off, but he's neatly forward to defend
reaches a flighted one and knocks it back to the bowler
hits a good length spot outside off immediately and is punched straight to short cover
slapped away to sweeper cover
pushed to the off side
in the air for a while but through vacant square leg as he turns a short of a length ball off the back foot
comes forward but cannot find any timing as he pushes to the off side
tossed up full around off, knocked back
length ball angled in, turned to midwicket
hurries in with the angle from wide of the crease, worked to midwicket
this time he is able to nudge it wide of midwicket for one
reaches this fuller one outside off and eases it out to the sweeper
leans forward, allows it to straighten and guides it behind point
Sanga takes this one behind the stumps, jumps and throws the ball in the air immediately, there was a sound as Anamul charged and heaved, umpire Oxenford unmoved though
pushed towards mid on
brings bat around front pad as he turns this length ball to the leg side
chops a good length ball but not wide enough of short cover
turns it in front of midwicket and rushes across for the single
uses the incoming angle to nudge it in front of square leg
reaches forward and pings short extra with a crisp drive
that was a good one, rushed in with the angle, Shamsur was leaning forward and survives with an inside edge to short fine leg
the incoming ball on his mind, he is tentative in defending this straightening delivery this time
escapes again, beaten by this tossed up ball as he wafts, an inside edge makes the ball go just past leg stump
comes in to the pads from a length, is tucked away to square leg
gives him width outside off and is cut away to deep backward point
a fuller one now, calmly turned past midwicket
again on the pads, worked to backward square leg
tossed up and coming in, he stays back and turns it square on leg
he bends and tries a scoop, and he's got enough bat on it to send it very fine down to the boundary
takes a couple of steps out, reaches the pitch, and carts it over the long-on boundary
cannot get under this one and has to nudge it to square leg
pushes to extra cover
a flatter one, he makes room and guides it to point
angled in to the pad, but he turns it straight to short fine leg
nudged carefully to square leg
an overpitched ball knocked down to long on
this short and wide one is slashed in the air, but does not carry to short third man
overpitched again and easily pushed down to long off
middle and leg line, he stays on the crease and turns it square
opens the face and runs this one to point
pushes a good length ball to the bowler
reaches forward and works this angled delivery to long on
in the air for some time as it is hit down to long off
squirts a fuller one to short extra cover
on the pad, whipped to backward square, and the single is on
walks out but the length is shortened and he has to push it back
full and quick, driven back to the bowler
defended off the front foot

given eventually by umpire Oxenford as Mendis implores a second time, tossed up on middle and leg and hitting him on the pad as he misses with the bat, was that headed down leg? Nope, replays show that hitting leg, umpire's call
leans forward and is away with a push to cover
straightens on middle but he goes back and is able to turn it square on the leg side

knocked him over, Mominul is rooted to the crease as Mendis tossed this up high, should have been forward really to such a full length, tries to play half-heartedly from the crease, and it spins away from middle and leg to uproot off stump
pushes  a tossed up ball to the bowler
Mushfiqur wants the single and is half way out before he is sent back, the throw is weak from cover, but he would have probably made it even if it was strong
hit out to sweeper cover
hurries on with the angle towards middle, but Mushfiqur works it neatly off the pad behind square
punched down to long on
pushes to cover and shouts an early call of no
a fuller one on middle and leg, eased to long on
gets bat around front pad to take this from off stump and nudge it behind square leg
slapped out to sweeper cover
flatter, cut away to sweeper cover
calmly forward to defend to extra cover
turned square on the leg side
punched to midwicket
leans forward to a full one and drives to long on
worked away to square leg off the pad
pushed down to long off

they get Mushfiqur now, the captain goes down for a scoop, misses, and is hit on the pad with one that comes in with the angle, umpire Bowden agrees with Sanga's loud appeal, that was hitting middle and leg, replays say
a leading edge now, it is in the air for a while but falls well short of point
tossed up full around off, pushed back to the bowler
width as this angles across Shakib, he cuts it late to the vacant third man rope
slower this time, he waits and taps it to sweeper cover
tossed up full on middle and leg, pushed to the leg side
he's still timing them, drives this overpitched one solidly but straight to short cover
tossed up delivery tapped back to the bowler
on the pads, nudged to fine leg
cut away but cannot beat point
a thick inside edge now as he drives at one that does not turn, away to short fine
beats midwicket with a push and long on runs to his right to field
full delivery pushed down the track
and beats him first ball with one that kicks from just back of a length, Anamul was on his toes, trying to turn it to the leg side
this time he succeeds and works this one out to deep square leg
pushes a good length delivery to short extra cover
cramped for room with a line just outside off, Shakib jabs it away
moves away with the angle from off stump, Shakib follows the line and guides it to cover
turned to deep midwicket for a single
comes forward and drives confidently to extra cover
tosses it up on middle, Shakib pushes it back
angled in full, and he bends to nudge it fine
tries to turn a flighted ball from outside off to the leg side, but only manages an edge to the pad
forward to defend a flighted delivery to short extra
good length on the stumps, knocked back to the bowler
stays on the crease and dabs this climbing delivery from around off to cover
tapped to point in the end, he seemed to be in two minds whether to play at it
good length delivery whipped to deep midwicket
squeezes out a length delivery around off to the sweeper
drives but without much timing, mid off fields
leans forward and across to tap it down the pitch
eased with the slight spin to long on
gets him to come out with lots of flight, it does not turn, but Shakib manages a thick inside edge to midwicket
pushed down to long off
spinning in a tad to middle and leg, pushed to the bowler
wanted to work this with the turn to the leg side but missed
turned off the pad to deep square leg
on top of the bounce on this back of a length ball to punch to the sweeper
could have been in trouble, missed the tuck to leg but rushed out as the ball rolled close to the pitch, bowler was onto it quickly and Shakib had to turn back
typical Shakib swat-drive through the covers, sweeper manages to keep them to one
leans into a pitched up delivery and drives to short extra
on middle and leg, and he uses the incoming angle to turn it to deep square

Thirimanne pulls off a cracker of a catch at midwicket, Anamul flicked in the air, Thirimanne jumped and stretched out his hands over his head to reach the ball, but could only parry it behind him, he fell to the ground, recovered quickly enough to rush back and take it low with another dive
turned to the leg side
makes some room to this one angled in full and drives it to long off
worked straight to square leg
defended off the front foot
successful first over comes to an end with a delivery on middle and leg that is nudged to midwicket
steps out and drives to wide long off
defended off the front foot
moves out of the crease and eases it to long off
this rushes on to him with the angle, he is playing from the crease but keeps it out
stretches forward to defend to the off side
comes across and works it square on the leg side, but there is a fielder there
this is angled in to his pads, he drives it hard to long on
knocks back  a full ball to the bowler
charges out and thumps this on the half volley to mid off
wayward delivery down the leg side, Nasir shuffles and drags it behind square, Mahela saves the boundary with a dive in the deep
opens the face and guides it to short third man
turned to square leg
midwicket dives and stops this clip off the pad
nudged square on the leg side for one
comes forward to defend one on off to the bowler
tight line again on off with this fuller one, pushed away off the front foot
attacks this overpitched delivery but mistimes it back to the bowler
pushed to point
Shakib leaves the crease and smashes this tossed up ball over extra cover
he's gone this time though, tried to repeat the stroke with another dash down the track, this one did not turn though, and the thick inside edge looped tamely to midwicket
paddles this from outside off behind square leg
goes back and whips one off middle down to long on
leans forward and taps it to point
stretches out to smother this down the track
leans back and punches this off the stumps to the sweeper
leans forward to defend this tossed up ball
has a slog at this flighted one and gets a thick inside edge through square leg, boundary save by a dive in the deep
mistimes a forcing shot on the off side
nudges this with the incoming angle behind square leg
pushed to the sweeper for a single
worked away through square leg
length delivery pushed back to the bowler
backs away and punches a quicker one but cannot beat the infield at covers
leans forward and knocks it back to the bowler
turned to midwicket
worked to square leg off the pad
a bouncer immediately, but down the leg side as batsman misses the hook
back of a good length delivery pushed down the pitch from the crease
opens the face and runs this one wide of third man
tries to squeeze this overpitched one on the off side but is beaten
a full toss smacked straight into Mathews at extra cover, hits him on the boot and he is in pain for a while
squeezes a full delivery down the track
a full one just outside off, tapped away to the leg side
pushed to the off side
length ball nudged wide of midwicket with the slight spin for an easy single
goes back and across to one bowled slower and is unable to make much of it
pushed down to long on for another single
cannot get it past midwicket with a nudge
quick and flat just outside off, slapped away to extra cover
leaves the crease, Mendis shortens it, and Nasir can only push it past the bowler for one
makes lots of room outside leg stump, but Mendis follows him, and his punch cannot beat cover
a flat one on middle, he pulls to deep square
much fuller now with some flight, defended
leaves the crease but cannot manage a decent connection, takes the single as the ball rolls to extra cover
comes across to a tossed up offbreak and turns it to midwicket
tries a reverse paddle but misses, but no harm as impact on pad was outside the line of off
knocked back to the bowler
first boundary of the Powerplay, he makes room and hammers an overpitched ball in the air to the straight boundary
leaves the crease, but gets too close to the pitch and digs it out to mid off for one
comes down the track but can only push it to the bowler
he's used Mendis' pace this time, dabbing it late from just outside off and beating a chasing short third man all the way to the rope
turns a length ball down to long on
worked to midwicket and by the time the deep fielder runs in, they have taken two
fails to nudge this tossed up ball to the leg side
slices this high over extra cover, sweeper has plenty of running to do in the deep
turned off middle backward of square leg
bowler tries to stop this push but concedes the single as he tumbles in front of the non-striker
backs away from the stumps, and dabs it late past the keeper
another late dab as he opens the face but finds short third this time
flat and into the right-hander, forced down to long on
he's struck this into the gap, down the track and lofting off the inner part of the bat, one bounce over the deep midwicket rope
missed stumping, he had another heave but missed this time, back leg was out of the crease but Sanga could not collect
turned square on the leg side
worked off the pad to the on side for two more
straightening but on the pad, and nudged behind square
good length offbreak worked through midwicket
touch short and he's pulled this into the gap between deep square and deep midwicket
has a slog, but it only goes as far as short fine, who has a go at the non-striker's and misses
finds midwicket as he turns this offbreak off the front foot
backs away to leg but bowler follows him with an offbreak and he can only tap it away
slips it full and just down the leg side, short fine tidies up
walks down the track but cannot get under the ball and has to knock it down the ground for one
around the blockhole on the stumps, dug back to the bowler
good length delivery steered late to third man on a bent knee
off stump uprooted, Mahmudullah has been backing away outside leg, tried that again, but Lakmal homed this yorker quick and under the swish of the bat
short and climbing down the leg side, nudged to fine leg
goes full again but into the pad, batsman can't do much with it and it rolls into the leg side
digs it short now, it is softly worked behind square leg
leaves the crease early, bowler shortens it and only a defensive push results
full and flighted now, eased to long off
drags a flatter one down to deep backward square leg
leaps out of the crease but gets into a tangle and misses the offbreak
backs away and has a swing, slices it in the air but it falls short of short third man
moves across but cannot nudge it beyond midwicket
Lakmal gets in the yorker close to off stump, but it is handled well too, squeezed out to deep point
another yorker from Lakmal as batsman makes room outside leg, cannot get much bat on it
Nasir's struggle is over, he heaves at a short of a length ball and the mishit sails to Mahela who comes in from long on to take it
full and around off stump again from Lakmal, squeezed out to coverrs
and an outside edge to this full delivery, along the ground to the lone wide slip
a low full toss this time, pushed into the pitch and bounces over the bowler, but mid on cuts it off
charges out and has a heave, slices it to short third man
full and straight on the stumps, nudged to midwicket for one
another heave, another edge, flies over short third man, he runs after it, but reaches it on the bounce
misses the sweep as this is sent full down leg
slips this down leg once more and this time it runs fine past the keeper
turns across the left-hander this time as he misses one more sweep and is hit on the shoulder
pitched up around off stump, pushed down the track
Lakmal continues to hurl in yorkers, Ziaur backs away to leg but this arrives full close to him, and he can only dig it back to the bowler
opens the face and squeezes out this low full toss to the sweeper
batsman and keeper both miss this length delivery that stays low, it bounces just in front of Sanga and runs into the boundary
very low full toss on the stumps, dug out down the pitch
terrific death bowling from Lakmal, one more in the blockhole, this time just outside off, and beaten Ziaur's swing after he backs away
this time he moves across to off stump, Lakmal is very full again and only a mishit back to him results
deep square leg's messed up, it was taken on the full and heaved in his direction, but the fielder did not quite pick up its path, and despite a late desperate dive to his left, it sped past him
gone this time, a slower one from the back of the hand, it arrives full at him, but is also dipping and goes past his swinging bat and cuts into off stump
another one, Thisara gets it full at the batsman, Rubel has a heave, inside edges and another one crashes into the stumps
does not get it as this full delivery around off is pushed back to him
cannot connect as he has a go, and the ball goes to the off side after hitting the pad
Bangladesh end the innings with another miss, Sunny cannot get bat to one going across him

inn2.comm: pitched up around off stump and pushed solidly to mid off
he's gone second ball, a nippy back of a length delivery going across, Kusal has a go at it, and edges it through to the keeper
away first ball with a nudge off his pad to deep square leg
pitched up delivery driven nicely to mid off
ending on middle from a fuller length, pushed away to the off side
pushed softly and mid off comes forward to field
right on target first ball with a full one on off stump, defended
overpitched on the pad, and clipped through midwicket
angled across from a good length, left alone
similar delivery going away outside off, he shoulders arms again

they have the big fish, Sanga is gone early, reaching out and trying a drive to one leaving him from a good length, and edging to first slip, came in at around chest height, popped out on the first try but was gobbled up on the second
just back of a length, angled in towards off, blocked
fuller one into the pad, flicked for square leg to make a diving stop
wide from just back of a length, guided to point
straight good length ball left alone outside off stump
wide delivery, Mahela is not going for it
length ball but on the pad, and tucked nicely in front of square leg
reaches forward and drives a pitched up ball to extra cover

run out chance, and Bangladesh gleefully take it, Mahela is gone for a duck, Thirimanne punches to cover and sets off, Mahela responds with a sprint that takes him more than half way up the track, Thirimanne sees Mahmudullah get to the ball with a dive and abandons the idea of a run, Mahela has no chance of making it back as the throw comes in to the bowler, who does well to gather it on the run and take the bails off
punched to short cover off the back foot
right on off stump, angling across from a good length, defended
oh dear, something happening every delivery here, Priyanjan gets a short ball and hooks in the air, but the ball swirls safely over square leg
another bouncer, around chest height, Priyanjan swivels and attacks it again, and comfortably beats fine leg to his left
pitches it up now, outside off stump, left alone
leans forward and taps a length ball to point
moves forward and pushes to extra cover
a shortish and wide ball moving further away, he goes after it, and misses
softly turns a length ball from off in the gap at midwicket
loose, he goes across and pushes off the back foot at a good length delivery that zips past the edge
full now, targetting the stumps, clipped to square leg
across in the crease and behind the line of this back of a length ball to block
opens the face and guides a climbing delivery to third man
a clip timed well enough in the gap at midwicket for them to come back for the second
good leave, this isn';t far from off, but the angle is taking it away
full delivery pushed off a thick outside edge to third man
full for the drive close to off, but he lets it be
turned straight to square leg off the pad
good delivery, pitched up and hurrying on towards the stumps, defended in time
across to defend this length delivery to the bowler
well played, this climbed a lot, but he got on top of that to send it racing into the deep square leg boundary
goes back and guides a short of a length ball to point
sees width and has a go but it hits the bottom part of the bat and lurches to point
just short of a length, around off stump, turned softly towards midwicket
goes back to this length ball but cannot find timing as this bounces a shade more
loose again from Priyanjan, he tries to punch this from deep in the crease, but is beaten by the bounce, wasn't short enough
this time he connects, it came in but started too far outside off, and he beats third man with a sharp cut
bat and pad together as he defends a pitched up ball to the bowler, got up more than he expected it to
another one on target, fullish around middle and leg, pushed to mid on
back of a length now, he turns it away, but finds square leg
punches a good length ball, not with much timing, to covers
reaches forward to defend a good length ball to the off side
leaves the crease, but is too close to the pitch and blocks it back
the one that comes in from wide of the crease, he is forward and keeps it out
comes down again and defends
not close to the pitch as he leaves the crease and pads it away on the forward push
punched to cover, Thirimanne wants the single, but is sent back, throw arrives to the keeper though
he has another charge, and this time a heave too, a thick inside edge runs fine past the stumps on the leg side
pushes this length delivery - in the air for a brief while - down to mid off
pushed off the front foot towards mid off
could have been tight, he pushes to cover and sets off, throw misses at the non-striker's, but he would have made it anyway probably
stays back and softly runs a good length ball to point
he's timed this through cover, stays in the crease and just gives it direction
has a whack at a short ball, it loops over square leg but falls well short and wide of the deep fielder
tossed up ball from over the stumps, eased down to long on
he insists on stepping out to Shakib almost every ball, just knocks it back to the bowler this time
leaving the crease once more to a flighted ball and defending it to the leg side
jumps out, takes it on the full and pushes it to long off
a flighted ball around the pads, nudged backward of square
fine attempt at midwicket by the captain, but this flick falls short even as he dives forward
good start, just short of a length, right on off and middle, blocked
opens the face as he drives, point fields
bends the knee and carves this good length ball but finds point once more
pitched up into the pad now, and turned past square leg for a couple
cannot time this length ball on the off side but there is time for a single to cover
that took off, and beat a surprised Priyanjan
makes room outside leg but Shakib follows him a very full length, and he can only dig it out
clipped off the pads in front of square leg
skips out and pushes forward to defend, is hit on the pad
comes in with the angle, but Priyanjan is forward and manages an inside edge to pad
this time he jumps out and hits it past the bowler to long off
worked in the air off the thigh pad to deep square leg
opens the face to guide this through cover
defends a good length ball to point

they break through again, beauty from Ziaur, angles it in back of a length and gets it to hold the line and rear up, Priyanjan has to play at it, and manages an edge that the keeper hangs on to with a tumble to his right
bends forward and defends a good length ball around off
midwicket is vacant and he nudges this one there to get off the mark
tossed up ball smothered off the front foot
takes a couple of steps out and blocks another one
angles it in full, Mathews is forward to defend calmly
this came in after pitching wide outside off, Mathews' cut races to point
nice timing on the clip through midwicket and a spirited chase by mid on too
another one comes in with the angle, but too full, and he defends with a thick inside edge
mishits a drive back to the bowler off  a length ball
nice meaty drive but straight to mid off
cuts away from a good length, and is guided to point
another fine drive straight to mid off
almost popped this slower one to midwicket, was wide of him in the end, and rolled to mid on
forward to block one pitched up around off
works a full delivery down to long on
straightens on middle and off, smothered with a forward stride
right forward to defend again
angled in from wide of the crease, and nudged past short leg
gathers himself and defends a flighted one down the track
a full toss on the pad, worked away to deep square leg
opens the face and punches this back of  a length ball to point
no width, but he's deftly guided it to third man
pushed down to mid on
pitched up and pushed neatly to mid on
opens the face to run it to backward point
tossed up delivery nudged to square leg for a single
pushed wide of the sweeper for a couple
full, and he has the opportunity to loft it out of the reach of a jumping mid off
squirts a length ball awkwardly to extra cover
straightish delivery pushed to the off side
Mathews takes on the first ball of the over, charges out and carts a length ball high and over the straight boundary
stays back to a length ball and stabs it back off the toe end
punches another good length ball back to the bowler
beaten, he's playing these length balls from the crease, this one goes past the edge and bounces in front of the keeper
whips a back of a length ball in front of square leg
pitched up to middle, defended carefully
nudged to square leg for a single
opens the face and runs this full one to vacant backward point
punched to mid on
makes some room and punches straight to extra cover
leans forward to defend down the track
tossed up ball blocked off the front foot
rides the bounce and guides this back of a length ball to backward point, who cannot stop it cleanly to his right as it bounces again just in front of him
taps a short of a length ball to point
a good length ball defended towards extra cover
steered to third man for a single
turned off the pad to deep square leg for a single
no room on offer around off and he pushes it to point

Thirimanne holes out, he's gone for a big hit to a tossed up ball, but hasn't quite got the distance, Rubel has put in a run from long on, and taken a superbly judged catch at the edge of the straight boundary
full delivery clipped down to long on
angled in full and goes down the leg side
nudged off the pad to square leg
whipped down to long on
goes back to punch straight to cover
blocked off the front foot
goes for the drive to a full one, and a thick edge flies past the wide slip to third man
pushed in the air but well short of the bowler
punched away off the back foot to cover
goes across and turns a length ball to midwicket
pushed to the off side close to the pitch
tight line around off stump, and Mathews defends from the crease
worked down the track and bowler dives to his left to stop it
forward to nudge in front of square leg for one
jumps out to smother it back to the bowler
flatter and on a length, he goes back and cuts it behind backward point
shorter this time, and punched out to the sweeper
worked with the turn to short midwicket
good length ball pushed back to the bowler
pushed away to extra cover
this comes in from back of a length, and Mathews carefully defended it down the track
edged, but wide of the keeper's dive, Ziaur has been keeping it tight outside off from just back of a length, Mathews hopped and jabbed at this one, but was fortunate
turned to deep square leg off the pad
thick outside edge rolls along to gully now as he sends a good length ball on the stumps
hits just back of a length and the line is just outside off, Mathews tries to work it to leg but cannot get hold of it
uses the angle on this short of a length ball to pick it off middle and into the fine leg boundary
solid punch to short cover
slaps a good length ball to short cover
bouncer now, Mathews goes down on it
another bouncer, and again Mathews goes down under it
good length delivery around off defended down the track
appeal for leg-before, he is hit right in front of middle after he misses the flick, but umpire Bowden shakes his head, probably pitched outside leg, replays confirm it did
mistimes a good length ball to short extra cover
full on the pads, and flicked out to deep square leg
just short of a length, hit to covers
bowls it on the pads with that field, and is picked away to the fine leg rope easily
short and into the body, brought down square on the leg side
this is wide but Mathews cannot manage to time as he attacks it
again on the pad, from a good length, and worked behind square leg
bowls it outside off now, he bends the knee and drives, towards extra cover
good length ball pushed to extra cover
kicks off a good length but Mathews drops it awkwardly on the off side and goes through for one even as cover runs in
back of a length, just outside off, blocked
overpitched with some width and dismissed, on a bent knee, in the gap between extra cover and mid off
on the leg side now as he turns this length ball past midwicket
stays on the crease and punches down the track, kept to a single as mid off runs across and dives to stop it
full just outside off stump, he is forward to defend
fuller, and driven this time, but to extra cover
attacks this pitched up delivery but only mishits to midwicket
this time he connects and how cleanly, Al Amin keeps it full, but also gives width with the angle across the left-hander, who bends the knee and carts him high over extra cover
digs in a bouncer now, batsman ducks
opens the face to a length ball and runs it to third man
full delivery driven to long off
turns an overpitched ball to long on from outside off
short and wide, carved away to the sweeper
some turn and bounce, Mathews goes back and pushes to midwicket
comes across and nudges with the spin to square leg
another nudge straight to square leg
full and wide, and he thumps it square, but a dive from point saves some runs
this time he beats point to his left as he punches a good length ball to the sweeper
comes forward and pushes to covers for a single
short ball, he crouches just under it
hits this good length delivery square but point is in the way
a thick edge flies now to the third man boundary as he drives at a full delivery
turns in from outside off but is guided in the gap through backward point for a couple
skips out, but is too close to the pitch and knocks it back
length ball on middle, he comes across to nudge it fine
on the front foot to nudge to square leg
nice, beats the outside edge with one that does not spin as much as Mathews was expecting it to as he pushed forward, wasn't too far from off stump too
he is hesitant to come forward now after last ball and almost gets into trouble with this one that stays low, just gets bat down on it or else he was plumb in front
he tries a big shot first ball, but is beaten by a full, flighted ball that also beats the keeper
almost a wicket, leading edge pops in the air but falls wide of extra cover
presses forward to block it to the bowler
good length ball stabbed back to the bowler
defended to short cover and he calls no early
some width on this flatter one as he punches wide of the sweeper, they decide to push for two and make it
stretches forward to defend a flighted one to the off side
forces a length ball to the bowler off the back foot
takes a step out to a flighted one and nudges to the leg side
steps out again and this time is able to knock it to long on for one
Mathews also takes a step or two out and smothers this one
straightens from a good length and is defended as he leans forward
whips a full delivery to long on
Mathews skips out and swats this against the turn, cleanly over midwicket, superb execution
now he goes back, makes some room and punches it from close to off to the sweeper
leaves the crease and turns it past midwicket
works a length ball past midwicket, mid on slides and stops it
lovely, down the track, to the pitch and lofts it way over mid off, one bounce over the rope
nudges an incoming delivery off the pad behind square
steps out and picks up one more single to long on
on the back foot and punches to long off
tosses it up way down the leg side, de Silva misses an attempted big sweep
could have been tight as he dabbed this to short third man, and Mathews charged for the single, but he was sent back just in time
dropped, full toss swung straight to fine leg, and it is put down, oh dear, Al Amin it is, is that the match for Bangladesh?
appeal for leg-before, de Silva shows the bat immediately, replays show there was a thick inside edge on to pad as he pushed forward
leans forward and blocks to the bowler

he's been given this time, keeper went up as soon as he took this one, umpire Oxenford raises the finger, de Silva has had a big slog at this tossed up ball, there was a sound, the ball seems to have brushed the thigh pad
gathers himself and pushes a fuller one to the bowler
comes in with the angle from round the stumps, punched to mid on
pushed towards midwicket
Thisara wants the single after a push to cover, but is sent back wisely
straightens on off, he is forward to defend
takes a step out and defends tightly to the leg side
they go for a sharp single after a nudge in front of midwicket and Thisara makes it across
turning into the pad, worked to deep square leg
forces a full ball past the bowler, long on runs across to field
straightens from round the stumps, into the pad, and is worked behind square
on middle stump, punched to midwicket
pushes in front of point and wants the single, but has to turn back
he's managed to guide this from close to off late past short third man, who gives chase and pulls it back in

tight, this could have been very tight, as they went for the single in front of point, fielder charged in, but failed to pick up the ball, Thisara could have been struggling otherwise, as it turns out, Mathews has reached his fifty
turned to midwicket
swatted from the crease past the bowler to long on
straightens on off stump, and is defended
bowled slower and straightens on off stump, pushed towards point and he isn't getting the single
hit down to long on for a single
length ball, he forces it straight to midwicket
has some room and capitalises immediately, it was angling across from round the stumps, and he cuts behind point to beat the sweeper
tough chance, Mathews pushed forward to a flighted one that did not turn, and the edge went just past the keeper's gloves
nudged to square leg
short fine leg dives to keep them to one after this nudge
spins in and bounces a tad extra, is worked square to leg
slaps a spinning one to extra cover
punches and beats extra cover's dive to take another single
turning in from outside off stump, worked in front of square leg
moves across carefully and nudges to square leg for one more
tosses it up and sends it down the leg side
dabs this fine on the off side
full on middle and leg, but Mathews moves across to work it past short fine leg, deep square has a long way to run to stop it
around a good length, punched to extra cover
short of a length now, knocked back to the bowler
a full toss on off, Mathews calmly pushes it to long on
awkwardly pushes a good length ball back to the bowler
forced through vacant midwicket but the man in the deep runs forward to keep them to one
whips a full delivery to long on
swivels and tries to pull this one as it heads down the leg side, misses
still just nudging it around, behind square leg for one more
gets some room and cuts hard to the sweeper
worked out to deep midwicket, they settle for one in the end
almost got him, he tried to force this length ball, it looped in the air but wide of extra cover
pulled down to long on for a single

confusion between the batsmen, and Bangladesh make the most of it, Perera smashed a full one back to the bowler, it hit his hands and went to mid off, they wanted to take the single, then hesitated, then scrambled for it, a direct hit was needed and a direct hit was produced by Rubel, catching Perera way short
short and wide now, but Mathews can slap it away only for a single to the sweeper
leans forward to a pitched up ball outside off and pushes to point
angled in to off stump now, pushed back to the bowler
a full toss hit to mid off, he has a go at the non-striker's end, and misses, but Senanayake would have made it anyway
Mathews calmly keeps strike with a push in the gap past cover
full toss but Mathews only taps it through square leg for one
Senanayake has found the boundary, tossed up around off and middle, and he smears it straight down the ground, beats long on comfortably
goes for it again, but it is a thick inside edge this time that runs to long on
overpitched ball drilled down to long off
flatter delivery worked wide of mid on for a single to level the scores
having painstakingly piloted the ship ashore, Mathews allows himself some release, seals the win with a slog over midwicket, and with an over to spare
